definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Le 13:32 scab, an eruption of skin, on head or in beard, causing suspicion of leprosy (lit. a tearing off, i.e. what one is inclined to scratch or tear away, cf. scabies fr. scabere, Krätze fr. kratzen, etc., v. Di:Le 13:30);—´[[נ]] abs. Le 13:30, Le 13:32, Le 13:32, Le 13:33, Le 13:34, Le 13:34, Le 13:35, Le 13:36, Le 13:37, Le 13:37; [[נׇ֑תֶק]] Le 14:54; [[נֶגַע]] [[הַנֶּתֶק]] Le 13:31, Le 13:31 (all P).
